wikipedia_page.main: Martin William Denton Beddoe (born 7 July 1955) is a British judge known for having presided over many high-profile criminal cases. He is a former Crown Court Recorder, member of the Parole Board of England and Wales and a tutor judge of the Judicial College. In March 2013 he was one of the judges appointed to hear an inquest into the death of Olaseni Lewis.

response: * Martin Beddoe, circuit judge  of England and Wales
